description: Biogenic amines are one of two broad classes of classical neurotransmitters (the other being amino acids) and include: acetylcholine, serotonin, histamine, and the catecholamines epinephrine, norepinephrine, and dopamine.  Source: http://www.whatislife.com/reader2/Metabolism/pathway/Neurotransmitter.html
title: Biogenic amine synthesis
